Key Match Events: India lost to Syria 3-0 in the Intercontinental Cup 2024
Liston Colaco unleashed a fiery shot that rattled the crossbar
Post-Match Reflections: India boss Manolo Marquez was happy with his side's performance despite the loss
Marquez felt that India was 1000 times better in the second half than in the first half
Marquez said his side was brave in the second half
Miscellaneous Highlights: India had a host of chances in the second half but were unable to score
The Syrian goalkeeper saved two or three very difficult balls
